content: Aug 28 Chipmaker Littelfuse Inc said on Monday it would buy peer IXYS Corp for about $750 million in cash and stock.
name: Littelfuse Inc
title: Chipmaker Littelfuse to buy IXYS for $750 million

content: Aug 28 Chipmaker Littelfuse Inc said on Monday it would buy peer IXYS Corp for about $750 million in cash and stock as the company expands into the lucrative automotive market.
name: Littelfuse Inc
title: UPDATE 1-Chipmaker Littelfuse to buy IXYS for $750 million
